languages.text: "Я узнаю, кто обрек на гибель моих братьев, и строго спрошу с них! Даю клятву!"
"I will find out who condemned my brothers to death, and I will bring them a harsh reckoning! I swear it!"
languages.original_text: "Я узнаю, кто обрек на гибель моих братьев, и строго спрошу с них! Даю клятву!"

traits.locale_text: "I will find out who condemned my brothers to death, and I will bring them a harsh reckoning! I swear it!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will find out who condemned my brothers to death, and I will bring them a harsh reckoning! I swear it!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will find out who condemned my brothers to death, and I will bring them a harsh reckoning! I swear it!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will find out who condemned my brothers to death, and I will bring them a harsh reckoning! I swear it!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我必将找出那些谋害了我兄弟们的人！我会以最残忍的方式清算宿怨！我发誓！”
languages.original_text: "I will find out who condemned my brothers to death, and I will bring them a harsh reckoning! I swear it!"

traits.locale_text: “我必将找出那些谋害了我兄弟们的人！我会以最残忍的方式清算宿怨！我发誓！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Je découvrirai qui a condamné mes frères à mort, et je lui ferai payer au centuple ! Je le jure ! »
languages.original_text: "I will find out who condemned my brothers to death, and I will bring them a harsh reckoning! I swear it!"

traits.locale_text: « Je découvrirai qui a condamné mes frères à mort, et je lui ferai payer au centuple ! Je le jure ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¡Encontraré a quien condenó a muerte a mis hermanos y le haré pagar por todo esto! ¡Lo juro!».
languages.original_text: "I will find out who condemned my brothers to death, and I will bring them a harsh reckoning! I swear it!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Encontraré a quien condenó a muerte a mis hermanos y le haré pagar por todo esto! ¡Lo juro!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「兄弟を死に追いやった者を見つけ出し、それ相当の報いを受けさせる！絶対だ！」
languages.original_text: "I will find out who condemned my brothers to death, and I will bring them a harsh reckoning! I swear it!"

traits.locale_text: 「兄弟を死に追いやった者を見つけ出し、それ相当の報いを受けさせる！絶対だ！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich werde herausfinden, wer meine Brüder zum Tode verdammt hat, und ich werde sie gnadenlos bestrafen! Das schwöre ich!"
languages.original_text: "I will find out who condemned my brothers to death, and I will bring them a harsh reckoning! I swear it!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde herausfinden, wer meine Brüder zum Tode verdammt hat, und ich werde sie gnadenlos bestrafen! Das schwöre ich!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "I will find out who condemned my brothers to death, and I will bring them a harsh reckoning! I swear it!"

languages.text: "Kardeşlerimi ölüme mahkûm eden kişiyi bulacak ve intikamlarını söke söke alacağım! Sözüm olsun!"
languages.original_text: "I will find out who condemned my brothers to death, and I will bring them a harsh reckoning! I swear it!"

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşlerimi ölüme mahkûm eden kişiyi bulacağım ve intikamlarını söke söke alacağım! Sözüm olsun!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
